name: Bubblemilk Pie
description: An innovative stuffed dessert. Crispy puff pastry, creamy filling, and the surprising sensation of bubbles bursting in sequence... This post-meal treat brings satisfaction to every taste bud. Remember to enjoy it while it's warm!

suspicious.name: Suspicious Bubblemilk Pie
suspicious.description: An innovative stuffed dessert. The bursting bubbles send waves of pain across your tongue â€” combined with the imagery of their green and crispy coatings, the experience is not unlike cramming exploding Dendro Cores into your mouth...
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Bubblemilk Pie
normal.description: An innovative stuffed dessert. Crispy puff pastry, creamy filling, and the surprising sensation of bubbles bursting in sequence... This post-meal treat brings satisfaction to every taste bud. Remember to enjoy it while it's warm!
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Bubblemilk Pie
delicious.description: An innovative stuffed dessert. This sweet indulgence begins with a crisp crackle of golden crust. Warm filling then cascades across your palate as bubbles meet and pop between your teeth, taking you on a journey across an unending spectrum of textures... This is the perfect finale to any feast!
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
